title: Runerigus

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Curse: Choose two players to haunt, placing a **Curse** on them. You can multitask one other ability with this one. (âˆž uses)
- Destiny Bond: Choose a player. When you die, you'll deal them an Powerful attack the following night. You'll bypass protective effects. (3 uses)
- Memento: Revive a dead Pokemember during the night. They will be purged and immune to hanging the next day. They'll also regain their uses of any limited-use abilities. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Night Shade: Your visits use Astral. Whenever a fellow Pokemember visits a **Cursed** target, their visit will use Astral as well.
- Hex: If all alive players are **Cursed**, including fellow Pokemembers, the Pokemon win the game and you deal an Overkill attack to all who oppose the Pokemon.
- Wandering Spirit: __All of your abilities may be used post-mortem. All attributes will still be in effect.__
